Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to enact and the President to sign the Flood Victim Premium Relief Act of 2013.
Items.MatterName: Flood Victim Premium Relief Act of 2013.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to amend the Biggert-Waters Flood Insurance Reform Act of 2012.
Items.MatterName: Biggert-Waters Flood Insurance Reform Act of 2012.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to enact and the President to sign H.2887/S.1480, a bill to amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to provide assistance for condominiums and housing cooperatives damaged by a major disaster, and for other purposes.
Items.MatterName: Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act. (H.2887/S.1480)
